mapper.insert: INSERT INTO questions(subject_id, qtype, content, qoptions, answer, create_user, create_time, update_time) VALUE (#{q.subjectId}, #{q.type}, #{q.content}, #{q.options}, #{q.answer}, #{q.createUser}, #{q.createTime}, #{q.updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, subject_id, qtype, content, qoptions, answer, correct_num, counts, create_user, create_time, update_time FROM questions WHERE subject_id=#{subjectId} AND qtype =#{type} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{size}
SELECT COUNT(1)FROM questions WHERE subject_id=#{subjectId} AND qtype =#{type}
mapper.update: UPDATE questions SET subject_id=#{q.subjectId}, content=#{q.content}, qoptions=#{q.options}, answer=#{q.answer}, update_time=#{q.updateTime} WHERE id=#{q.id}
UPDATE question_info SET correct_num = correct_num+1, counts = counts+1 WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE question_info SET counts = counts+1 WHERE id=#{id}
